name: Cool Blue Interactive
description:
Founded in 1997, Cool Blue Interactive is an award-winning UX, web design, and Drupal CMS focused development firm ranked among the top interactive agencies in Atlanta.
An innovative agency whose senior leadership works closely with clients to ensure maximum and measurable return on investment, Cool Blue combines the industry’s newest advancements with years of real-world expertise, best practices in usability and information architecture and cutting-edge creative.  Our comprehensive solutions help organizations attract, convert and retain customers – with proven results.
From mobile friendly, drupal cms-driven websites and native phone apps, to powerful online metrics and marketing strategies, our goal is simple: to develop the best interactive experience for the user and get your organization the results you desire.
Cool Blue is an active, enthusiastic contributor to the Drupal project. Starting in 2008 Cool Blue has focused on building and maintaining Drupal websites for our clients. Our developers contribute and support Drupal core development. We offer our clients training in the Drupal CMS to give them confidence in maintaining their site in-house.
